title: Nature Boy
lyrics:
There was a boy
A very strange enchanted boy
They say he wandered very far, very far
Over land and sea
A little shy
And sad of eye

But very wise

Was he



And then one day

A magic day he came my way

And while we spoke of many things, fools and kings

This he said to me

"The greatest thing

You'll ever learn

Is just to love

And be loved

In return"



(instrumental interlude)



"The greatest thing

You'll ever learn

Is just to love

And be loved

In return"
